caption.p: Example of a TIC chromatogram for extract of salvia leaves dried naturally. The chromatogram was obtained for the maximum absorbing wavelength at each time point; (1) p-coumaric acid ( m/ z = 162.8/119.1) and its derivatives; (2) ferulic acid ( m/ z = 192.8/134.0); (3) catechin ( m/ z = 289.0/289.0) and its derivatives.
